description: Enhance your TTBTrackr experience through personalized profiles. Easily manage your notifications by using `/profile edit`.

fields.name: Streamlined Communication
fields.value: Experience the power of expanded communication with TTBTrackr. Receive notifications not just through Discord Direct Messages, but also through other channels.

fields.name: Instagram Alerts
fields.value: Stay connected even without Discord access. Opt for Instagram DM notifications by adding your username via /profile edit.

fields.name: SMS Notifications
fields.value: Receive vacancy alerts via SMS (Canada only). Your phone number, when added through `/profile edit`, enables this feature. **Consent to store your number is required.**

fields.name: Upcoming: Phone Call Alerts
fields.value: Stay tuned for an exciting addition! Phone call notifications are in development and will be available soon.

fields.name: Customize Contact Preferences
fields.value: Adapt notifications to your preferences using `/profile view` to enable or disable specific contact methods.

fields.name: Profile Deletion
fields.value: If needed, delete your profile using `/profile delete`. This action removes your data and tracked courses. Please note that it's irreversible.
